member.name: XINPUT_CAPABILITIES
member.summary: Describes the capabilities of a connected controller. The function returns XINPUT_CAPABILITIES.

summary.code: Controller type. It must be one of the following values.

listheader.description: The device is a game controller.

summary.para: Subtype of the game controller. See XINPUT and Controller Subtypes for a list of allowed subtypes.
summary.div: Note For restrictions on the use of this subtype value, see Remarks. More subtypes may be added in the future.

listheader.description: Device has an integrated voice device.
Device supports force feedback functionality. Note that these force-feedback features beyond rumble are not currently supported through XINPUT on Windows.
Device supports plug-in modules. Note that plug-in modules like the text input device (TID) are not supported currently through XINPUT on Windows.
Device lacks menu navigation buttons (START, BACK, DPAD).

member.name: XINPUT_CAPABILITIES.Gamepad
member.summary: structure that describes available controller features and control resolutions.

member.name: XINPUT_CAPABILITIES.Vibration
member.summary: structure that describes available vibration functionality and resolutions.
